classification: Beadwork; Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects
creditline: Gift of George W. Rickey in memory of Edith L. Rickey
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rounded body on thick base; long, thin neck; beaded overall in blue and white with diamond, triangle and banded designs.  Stopper is beaded with green base, blue and yellow diamond pattern with 3 shapes down the back; face and sides have triangular white beaded areas; tail covered in shells.
medium: Gourd, plant fiber, wood, cloth, cowrie shells, beads
title: Wine bottle with stopper
